library(tidyverse)

# Problem 1


Import the pols-month.csv, unemployment.csv, and snp.csv.


```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-", convert = TRUE, remove = FALSE) |>
  
  mutate(
    month = case_match(
      month,
      1 ~ "Jan",
      2 ~ "Feb", 
      3 ~ "Mar", 
      4 ~ "Apr", 
      5 ~ "May", 
      6 ~ "Jun", 
      7 ~ "Jul",
      8 ~ "Aug", 
      9 ~ "Sep", 
      10 ~ "Oct", 
      11 ~ "Nov", 
      12 ~ "Dec")
  )
```
 


```{r}
unemployment_df = 
  read_csv("data/unemployment.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() 
```


```{r}
snp_df = 
  read_csv("data/snp.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() 
```
